Module IO
Package resource

Class ResourceDatabase<K,R,P>

java.lang.Object
resource.ResourceDatabase<K,R,P>
Type Parameters:
K - The type of the resource key.
R - The type of the resource.
P - The type of the resource parameter used for loading.
public class ResourceDatabase<K,R,P> extends Object
ResourceDatabase is a generic class that manages the loading, caching, and accessing of resources using a specified resource loading strategy. It allows for asynchronous loading of resources and keeps track of various resource statistics like load times, access counts, save counts, save times, and exceptions.
Since:
1.0

      public R get(K key)
      Synchronously retrieves a resource for the specified key.

      Returns:

      public ResourceMetrics getMonitor(K key)
